item.title: Dropping Executables with Powershell
item.description: Scenario: You find yourself in a limited Windows user environment without the ability to transfer binary files over the network for one reason or another. So this rules out using a browser, ftp.exe, mspaint (yes, mspaint can be used to transfer binaries), etc. for file transfer. Suppose this workstation isn’t
